snippet.title: Doors & Loot Trailer
snippet.description:
Play as Dorian and reach the top of the tower to stop the sorcerer who lives there. Help the trapped people escape from there. They will help you improve your skills and equipment.The higher you go, the better the reward. After clearing a floor, you can choose to return and rest with the special reward from the chest or continue another floor with stronger enemies but better rewards.
Available on Steam
